original_title: 劇場版 Free! -Timeless Medley- 約束
overview: Rin Matsuoka loves swimming! Especially his childhood friend Haruka he wants to beat at all costs. But then his old friend Sosuke shows up, he is a lone fighter and wants to convince Rin to focus on himself. A turbulent time is ahead for all, in which they must realize what really counts for them.
title: Free!: Timeless Medley - The Promise
